EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #1 - EMEA - Forrester - 2014.12.11.Email - Follow Up - No
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Continuous Integration and DevOps webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Is Testing the Weakest Link in Continuous Integration and DevOps?
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, "Is Testing the Weakest Link in Continuous Integration and DevOps?" In the webinar, Tricentis Co-Founder Wolfgang Platz and Forrester Research Vice President and Principal Analyst, Diego Lo Giudice, presented their best practices for agile and efficient testing strategies. Questions from the audience helped keep the webinar lively and informative.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/agile-testing-webinar-series-20141211/>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Diego Lo Giudice Vice President and Principal Analyst Forrester Research
Wolfgang Platz Founder and Chief Product Officer Tricentis
